example.parse: (S (NP-VOC (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM فخامة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الرئيس))) (PUNC ,) (NP (PRT (VOC_PART ايها)) (DET+NOUN الاخ) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM الحبيب))) (PUNC ,) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1S لست) (NP-SBJ-2 (-NONE- *)) (S (VP (IV1S+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ادري) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (SBAR (WHADVP-3 (REL_ADV كيف)) (S (VP (IV1S+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I افصح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP عن) (NP (NOUN مشاعر) (NP (POSS_PRON_1S ي)))) (ADVP-MNR (-NONE- *T*-3)))))))))

frameset.comment: كشف عن / أبدى للعيان / أفشى سرا
